data.text:
METAR Riola Agro Airstrip - ES-0268

Riola Agro Airstrip is a small airport in València, Valencia, Spain. The airport is located at latitude 39.18074 and longitude -0.33846. The airport has one runway: 18/36. This airport has no ICAO code, we use ES-0268 as reference. The airport is in the Barcelona FIR.

This aviation weather observation was made for Valencia Airport on August 12, 2024 14:00, local time.

Airport observations

The wind is from direction 130° with a speed of 10 kt. The wind direction varies between 100° and 160°.

The weather is CAVOK. That means there are no clouds below 5,000 ft or the MSA (minimum safe altitude), whichever is higher. This also means that no cumulonimbus or towering cumulus clouds have been observed and the visibility is 10 km or more or more. Furthermore, there can't be fog, precipitation nor other significant weather.

The temperature and wind chill are 32 °C. The heat index is 34. The dew point is 20 °C, the relative humidity is 49%. The air pressure at sea level is 1011 hPa (QNH).

Daylight period

Today the sun rises at 07:12 and sets at 21:00. This applies to Riola Agro Airstrip, the universal daylight period may be different. The difference between the local time and UTC is +2 hour. Daylight saving time is currently in progress.

Companies

We don't have information about companies on this airport. Are you looking to buy a home or other real estate at the Costa del Sol, check out Van den Boom Real Estate, Real Estate Agent Costa del Sol.
